Archive

  • March 19, 2012 – First SOTA Activation on Bare Mountain
    13 QSOs on 20m in tough band conditions, but a great day to be outside and work SOTA!
  • March 24, 2012 – SOTA Activation of Pine Mountain
    SSB contest made QSOs tough, but squeezed out 4 QSOs for an activation point
  • April 14, 2012 – SOTA Activation of Mount Norwottock
    New homebrew Buddipole let me work the world, including first summit-to-summit
  • April 20, 2012 – SOTA Activation of Quabbin Hill
    A windy day in which 20m opened into eastern Europe
  • May 12, 2012 – A 20 Meter Kite Antenna
    Playing with a 20m end-fed kite antenna on Quabbin Hill
  • May 20, 2012 – SOTA Activation of Mount Tom
    A long, hot hike, and a so-so 20m band, but all the more rewarding
  • June 11, 2012 – VHF QSO Party 2012
    6m openings are fun!
  • July 01, 2012 – SOTA Activation of Mount Toby
    Hot day, lots of signal fading, but nice view and got 10 QSOs on 20m
